The mysterious herb is a herb obtained from Serafina's home during A Taste of Hope. It is used to create the potion and blood potion, along with some mysterious crushed meat.

[[File:Mysterious herb detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''mysterious herb''' is a herb obtained from Serafina's home during [[A Taste of Hope]]. It is used to create the [[Potion (A Taste of Hope)|potion]] and [[blood potion]], along with some [[mysterious crushed meat]].
